data.name: Next Stop 3
data.detailed_description:
The eccentric Margaret is once again shocking all of her friends! She got approved for huge loans and started out to complete the most exciting of
quests along with her shocked team. Fifty levels and a variety of quests aimed to restore the dilapidated railway and decrepit infrastructure await
us. And that is not all! Margaret undertook a billion-dollar commitment to build a sorting center and improve the turnover in this fascinating clicker
mini-game!

  • 50 varied levels
  • Bonus: city-building
  • Clicker Mini Game
  • Varied objectives
  • Relaxed mode: play without a timer
data.about_the_game:
The eccentric Margaret is once again shocking all of her friends! She got approved for huge loans and started out to complete the most exciting of

data.short_description: Margaret needs your help once again! You must repair the railway over 50 levels, build a sorting center and win in a billion-dollar escapade!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Win XP / Vista / Win7/ Win8 / Win10
  • Процессор: 1.6GHz
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • DirectX: Версии 7.0
  • Место на диске: 260 MB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: 10.11/10.10/10.9/10.8/10.7
  • Процессор: 1.6GHz
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 280 MB
